snippet: The meteor that exploded over Russia was said to have set off the largest explosion of its kind in more than a century. And  more unusual, it left many people hurt, mostly from flying glass.
abstract: Meteor that broke up over Russia is said to have set off largest explosion of its kind in more than century, causing many injuries, mostly from flying glass as shock wave violently jolted city Chelyabinsk.
lead_paragraph: The meteor that exploded over Russia was said to have set off the largest explosion of its kind in more than a century. And  more unusual, it left many people hurt, mostly from flying glass.

headline.main: Size of Blast and Number of Injuries Are Seen as Rare for a Rock From Space
headline.print_headline: Size of Blast and Number of Injuries Are Seen as Rare for a Rock From Space
